# evaluation(on:)

**Instance Method**

Generates metrics describing the hand action classifier’s performance on labeled videos.

## Declaration

```swift
func evaluation(on annotatedVideos: MLHandActionClassifier.DataSource) throws -> MLClassifierMetrics
```

## Parameters

- **annotatedVideos**: An [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLHandActionClassifier/DataSource] instance.

## Evaluating a hand action classifier

- **trainingMetrics**: Measurements of the hand action classifier’s performance on the training dataset.
- **validationMetrics**: Measurements of the hand action classifier’s performance on the validation dataset.
